markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Racharak](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1542)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)): DC 34

**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 34

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Racharak](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1542)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Charau-ka" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=263" />
<trait label="Dragon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=50" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders](/Sources.aspx?ID=7) pg. 34</row>

**Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +12, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +10, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +17, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +14, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +15, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +14

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +3

**Con** +5

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +19 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +16 

</row>

**HP** 135

**Immunities**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)

**Tail Swipe** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature within reach of Racharak's tail uses a [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114) action or leaves a square during a move action it's using. **Effect** Racharak makes a tail Strike at the creature with a –2 penalty. If it hits, she disrupts the creature's action.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +20,
**Damage** 2d8+9 piercing plus 2d4 fire

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +20 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 2d8+9 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +20 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+9 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
thrown rock +17 ([deadly 1d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 2d6+9 bludgeoning

**Breath Weapon** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) Racharak breathes flames that deals 9d6 fire damage to all creatures in a 30-foot cone (DC 26 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). She can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.

**Draconic Frenzy** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Racharak makes two claw Strikes and one bite Strike in any order.

**Shrieking Frenzy** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Trigger** The charau-ka's turn begins; **Effect** The charau-ka is [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) until the end of their turn and can use the extra action only to Stride or Strike. While in the frenzy, the charau-ka can't speak and automatically critically fails [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks, due to their loud wailing.

**Thrown Weapon Mastery**   Any weapon a charau-ka throws gains the [deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174) weapon trait. Furthermore, when a charau-ka throws an improvised weapon, they do not take the –2 penalty for doing so, nor does they take a penalty for using a thrown improvised weapon with the [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) trait to make a lethal attack.

</column>
name: Racharak
